In England, in the seven days to 22 September, there were 177,373 new confirmed cases (313.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 September, there were 146,987 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 21% (30,386 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 27 September is 6,561,706 (11,603.3 cases per 100,000 population).
